    • Uses of IRtfListener in com.rtfparserkit.parser.standard

      Classes in com.rtfparserkit.parser.standard that implement IRtfListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StandardRtfParser
      This class builds on the RawRtfParser to provide a parser which can deal with character encodings and Unicode.
      Methods in com.rtfparserkit.parser.standard with parameters of type IRtfListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StandardRtfParser.parse(IRtfSource source, IRtfListener listener)
      Main entry point: parse RTF data from the input stream, and pass events based on the RTF content to the listener.
